sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysevent_email_template"><sysevent_email_template action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><collection>kb_submission</collection><email_layout display_value="Classification Unsubscribe and Preferences">f4a2950cdb64130093da55d0cf9619ea</email_layout><message><![CDATA[Thank you for submitting ${number}. We appreciate your willingness to help out the knowledge management team. Unfortunately, your submission was deemed to be an invalid entry. In general this means your article either A) answered a question for which we have little demand or B) didn't provide sufficient information for us to build a full knowledge article off of.

The knowledge engineer had the following comments upon closure:
${close_notes}

    ]]></message><message_html/><message_list/><message_text/><name>Knowledge Closed Invalid</name><sms_alternate/><subject>Your KB Submission ${number} was closed as an invalid</subject><sys_class_name>sysevent_email_template</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>glide.maint</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2007-06-04 19:46:55</sys_created_on><sys_id>f8469a360a0a0a6f00e7f13b2ff30883</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Knowledge Closed Invalid</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Knowledge Management" source="com.glideapp.knowledge">863d4893db803300b53f341f7c96197b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysevent_email_template_f8469a360a0a0a6f00e7f13b2ff30883</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>erwinel_da</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-09-12 22:58:40</sys_updated_on><sys_version/></sysevent_email_template></record_update>

sc_requestf4a2950cdb64130093da55d0cf9619ea template.print("

Requested items:\n"); var gr = new GlideRecord("sc_req_item"); gr.addQuery("request", current.sys_id); gr.query(); while(gr.next()) { var stage = gr.stage.getDisplayValue(); if (JSUtil.nil(stage)) stage = gr.stage.getChoiceValue(); template.print(gr.number + ": " + gr.cat_item.getDisplayValue() + ", Stage: " + stage + "\n"); } ]]>request.generalRequest ${number}sysevent_email_templateglide.maint2006-02-03 01:53:152d9cf960c611228400ba63a2b240959520request.general044dc893db803300b53f341f7c9619b9globalsysevent_email_template_2d9cf960c611228400ba63a2b2409595erwinel_da2019-09-12 22:57:22

sys_update_xml.name: sysevent_email_template_9fcbcc11eb31310023c7a9bcf106fe8d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysevent_email_template"><sysevent_email_template action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><collection>task_activity</collection><email_layout display_value="Classification Unsubscribe and Preferences">f4a2950cdb64130093da55d0cf9619ea</email_layout><message/><message_html/><message_list/><message_text><![CDATA[BEGIN:VCALENDAR
PRODID:-//Service-now.com//Outlook 11.0 MIMEDIR//EN
VERSION:2.0
METHOD:CANCEL
BEGIN:VEVENT
STATUS:CANCELLED
ORGANIZER;CN=${from_user.name}:MAILTO:${from_user.email}
ATTENDEE;ROLE=REQ-PARTICIPANT;RSVP=TRUE:MAILTO:${to}
ATTENDEE;ROLE=REQ-PARTICIPANT;RSVP=TRUE:MAILTO:${from_user.email}
LOCATION:${location}
DTSTART:${dtstart}
DTEND:${dtend}
UID:${sys_id}
SEQUENCE:${sys_mod_count}
DTSTAMP:${dtstamp}
DESCRIPTION:${description}
SUMMARY:${subject}
END:VEVENT
END:VCALENDAR]]></message_text><name>task_activity.appointment_cancellation</name><sms_alternate/><subject/><sys_class_name>sysevent_email_template</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-01-22 19:12:18</sys_created_on><sys_id>9fcbcc11eb31310023c7a9bcf106fe8d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>task_activity.appointment_cancellation</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Task Activities" source="com.snc.task_activity">913e160edbd07300b53f341f7c9619f3</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysevent_email_template_9fcbcc11eb31310023c7a9bcf106fe8d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>erwinel_da</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-09-12 22:49:00</sys_updated_on><sys_version>2</sys_version></sysevent_email_template></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysevent_email_template"><sysevent_email_template action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><collection>sys_sync_history</collection><email_layout display_value="Classification Unsubscribe and Preferences">f4a2950cdb64130093da55d0cf9619ea</email_layout><message/><message_html/><message_list/><message_text><![CDATA[Push Name: ${name}
Request sent on: ${sys_created_on}
Status: Your code request is ${stage}
 
<mail_script>
    template.print("Click here for more details: \n");
    var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_update_set_source");
    gr.addQuery("instance_id", current.instance);
    gr.query();
    if (gr.next())  {
       template.print(gr.url + "/nav_to.do?uri=sys_sync_history.do?sys_id=" + current.source_history + "&sysparm_stack=sys_sync_history_list.do" + "\n");
   }
</mail_script>]]></message_text><name>Code Review Update</name><sms_alternate><![CDATA[ ]]></sms_alternate><subject>Your code review request is ${stage} </subject><sys_class_name>sysevent_email_template</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2014-01-07 19:53:11</sys_created_on><sys_id>4cf85f7ebf0211002eff1c2a7f07395d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Code Review Update</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Team Development" source="com.snc.apps_hub">f5d888d3db003300b53f341f7c96199a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysevent_email_template_4cf85f7ebf0211002eff1c2a7f07395d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>erwinel_da</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-09-12 22:58:11</sys_updated_on><sys_version>2</sys_version></sysevent_email_template></record_update>

${sysapproval.description}

sys_update_xml.name: sysevent_email_template_f1fb4a87c0a8011b01f86e79d14b0990
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysevent_email_template"><sysevent_email_template action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><collection>sysapproval_approver</collection><email_layout display_value="Classification Unsubscribe and Preferences">f4a2950cdb64130093da55d0cf9619ea</email_layout><message><![CDATA[Short Description: ${sysapproval.short_description}
Priority: ${sysapproval.priority}
Requested For: ${sysapproval.requested_for}
Requested By: ${sysapproval.opened_by}
Total Price: ${sysapproval.price}
<hr/>
<mail_script>
  template.print("Summary of Requested items:\n");  
  var item = new GlideRecord("sc_req_item");
  item.addQuery("request", current.sysapproval);
  item.query();
  while(item.next()) {
      template.print(item.number + ":  " + item.quantity + " X " + item.cat_item.getDisplayValue() + " at " + item.price.getDisplayValue() + " each \n");
      template.print("    Options:\n");
      var keys = new Array();
      var set = new GlideappVariablePoolQuestionSet();
      set.setRequestID(item.sys_id);
      set.load();
      var vs = set.getFlatQuestions();
      for (var i=0; i < vs.size(); i++) {
        if(vs.get(i).getLabel() != '') {
           template.space(4);
           template.print('     ' +  vs.get(i).getLabel() + " = " + vs.get(i).getDisplayValue() + "\n");  
        }
      }
  }
</mail_script>
Comments:
${sysapproval.description}
<hr/>
${mailto:mailto.approval}
<hr/>
${mailto:mailto.rejection}
<hr/>
Approval Activity:
${mail_script:approval_activity}
<hr />
Click here to view Approval Request: ${URI}
Click here to view ${sysapproval.sys_class_name}:  ${sysapproval.URI}
]]></message><message_html/><message_list/><message_text/><name>request.itil.approve.role</name><sms_alternate/><subject>${sysapproval.sys_class_name} ${sysapproval} Approval Request</subject><sys_class_name>sysevent_email_template</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>glide.maint</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2006-06-20 15:07:25</sys_created_on><sys_id>f1fb4a87c0a8011b01f86e79d14b0990</sys_id><sys_mod_count>34</sys_mod_count><sys_name>request.itil.approve.role</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Service Catalog Platform" source="com.glideapp.servicecatalog.platform">044dc893db803300b53f341f7c9619b9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysevent_email_template_f1fb4a87c0a8011b01f86e79d14b0990</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>erwinel_da</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-09-12 22:56:18</sys_updated_on><sys_version/></sysevent_email_template></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysevent_email_template"><sysevent_email_template action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><collection>sysapproval_approver</collection><email_layout display_value="Classification Unsubscribe and Preferences">f4a2950cdb64130093da55d0cf9619ea</email_layout><message><![CDATA[Click here to approve ${sysapproval}]]></message><message_html/><message_list/><message_text/><name>mailto.approval</name><sms_alternate/><subject>Re:${sysapproval} - approve</subject><sys_class_name>sysevent_email_template</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>glide.maint</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2005-05-09 19:11:57</sys_created_on><sys_id>c2dee61cc611227601f80c0ea98f9a3f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>18</sys_mod_count><sys_name>mailto.approval</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Service Management Basics" source="com.snc.service">bc3c805fdb403300b53f341f7c96193b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysevent_email_template_c2dee61cc611227601f80c0ea98f9a3f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>erwinel_da</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-09-12 22:50:14</sys_updated_on><sys_version/></sysevent_email_template></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sysevent_email_template_49838e340a0a0b4b0049d6ce61c8c598
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysevent_email_template"><sysevent_email_template action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><collection>incident</collection><email_layout display_value="Classification Unsubscribe and Preferences">f4a2950cdb64130093da55d0cf9619ea</email_layout><message><![CDATA[Your incident ${number} has been resolved and will automatically close <mail_script>
var days = parseInt(gs.getProperty("glide.ui.autoclose.time"));
var hours = days * 24;

if (days == 0)
    template.print('now');
else if (days <= 3)
    template.print('in ' + hours + ' hour' + ((hours>1) ? 's' : ''));
else
    template.print('in ' + days + ' day' + ((days>1) ? 's' : ''));
</mail_script>. If you feel the issue is not resolved, please click the following link to reopen your incident:
${mailto:mailto.unsatisfied}

Short Description:
Short description: ${short_description}
Priority: ${priority}
Category: ${category}
Comments:
Additional comments: ${comments}
<hr/>
Click here to view Incident: ${URI_REF}]]></message><message_html/><message_list/><message_text/><name>incident.ess.resolve</name><sms_alternate/><subject>Your incident ${number} has been resolved</subject><sys_class_name>sysevent_email_template</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>glide.maint</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2009-05-16 13:09:50</sys_created_on><sys_id>49838e340a0a0b4b0049d6ce61c8c598</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>incident.ess.resolve</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Best Practice - Incident Resolution Workflow" source="com.snc.bestpractice.incident">701e48d7db803300b53f341f7c961920</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysevent_email_template_49838e340a0a0b4b0049d6ce61c8c598</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>erwinel_da</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-09-12 22:49:17</sys_updated_on><sys_version/></sysevent_email_template></record_update>
